alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 10:00PM EST until January 26 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Locally higher amounts possible where bands persist. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Southern Erie counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Wednesday. The heaviest snow is expected between 3 AM and 10 AM. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Snow is expected to peak during the morning commute on Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...One inch per hour snowfall rates are possible on Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
